snippet: Heather Lendway and Steven Mantell won the USA Triathlon Olympic-Distance National Championships in Milwaukee.
abstract: Heather Lendway and Steven Mantell win USA Triathlon Olympic-Distance National Championships in Milwaukee.
lead_paragraph: Heather Lendway and Steven Mantell won the USA Triathlon Olympic-Distance National Championships in Milwaukee.

headline.main: Minnesotan Repeats as National Triathlon Champion
